forward_facing: one side of the square vehicle space
propulsion: alchemical (10 squares of alchemical engines; hardness 8, hp 200)
weapons: 2 Large direct-fire ranged siege engines on the arms
driving_space: a single 5-ft.-by-5-ft. square that contains the two levers that serve as the steam giant's driving device; these levers are located on the third (top) deck of the vehicle
